name: cbdc-multi-node-system
description: Multi-node Central Bank Digital Currency System

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd central-bank && npm install && cd ../fi-node && npm install && cd ../web-dashboard && npm install
scripts.start:fi1: cd fi-node && FI_PORT=4001 FI_NAME=FI-Alpha FI_ID=fi-001 npm start
scripts.start:fi2: cd fi-node && FI_PORT=4002 FI_NAME=FI-Beta FI_ID=fi-002 npm start
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:central-bank" "sleep 2 && npm run start:fi1" "sleep 2 && npm run start:fi2" "npm run start:dashboard"
